com.matrixone.apps.domain.util
Class ContextUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.matrixone.apps.domain.util.ContextUtil

public class ContextUtil
extends java.lang.Object

The ContextUtil class contains static methods for context-related activities.

Version:
AEF 9.5.1.0 - Copyright (c) 2002, MatrixOne, Inc.

abortSavePoint

public static void abortSavePoint(Context context,
                                  java.lang.String savePoint)
                           throws FrameworkException
Aborts a database transaction to a save point. A save point must already be set for this command to work.

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
savePoint - the savepoint to rollback to
Throws:
FrameworkException - if operation fails.
Since:
AEF 9.5.1.0

pushContext

public static void pushContext(Context context,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String password,
                               java.lang.String vault)
                        throws FrameworkException
Set the context to the specified user. The popContext method must be called to go back to the previous context.

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
name - The new user name
password - The new password
vault - The new vault
Throws:
FrameworkException - if the operation fails
Since:
AEF 9.5.1.0

setSavePoint

public static void setSavePoint(Context context,
                                java.lang.String savePoint)
                         throws FrameworkException
Updates an existing database transaction with a database save point. A transaction must already be started for this command to work.

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
savePoint - the name of the save point to add to the transaction. Note: save point is limited to 30 characters of letters, numbers, and underscores. Spaces and punctuation characters are not allowed.
Throws:
FrameworkException - if the operation fails
Since:
AEF 9.5.1.0

startTransaction

public static boolean startTransaction(Context context,
                                       boolean update)
                                throws FrameworkException
Starts a database transaction.

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
update - determines whether the transaction is opened as write (true) or read (false).
Returns:
true if the transaction started; false if started already.
Throws:
FrameworkException - if the operation fails
Since:
AEF 9.5.1.0
